pullrequest.title: Node.hh: don't dereference _cb when it isn't a pointer

content.raw:
Good catch on the syntax bug.

I'd be inclined to add a test for this, but it's a deprecated function, and we wouldn't want our tests to emit deprecation warnings.

One idea might be to add a designated test file for deprecated functions and then explicitly suppress deprecation warnings for that specific translation unit.

Good catch on the syntax bug.

I'd be inclined to add a test for this, but it's a deprecated function, and we wouldn't want our tests to emit deprecation warnings.
